title: (x) Inline gothic display face in latest issue of Wired - H&FJ Cyclone {Noah Simon}
content:
The latest issue of Wired used this interesting gothic inline for their article on "Fail." I've seen similar faces other places, including work for Whataburger. I know this might be just some fancy stroke work, or overlaying a thinner face on top of a heavier one, but I'm still holding out for it just being one face. I've included some samples from the magazine.

Thanks!

[http://drp.ly/6ImeX](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202081225/http:/drp.ly/6ImeX "http://drp.ly/6ImeX")  
 [http://drp.ly/6In5m](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202081225/http:/drp.ly/6In5m "http://drp.ly/6In5m")
author: benjaminmikiten
